spec_data.Name: python-fmn-lib
spec_data.Description:
fmn is a family of systems to manage end-user notifications triggered by
fedmsg, the Fedora FEDerated MESsage bus.

This modules contains the internal API for components and data model for Fedora
Notifications
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 01:06:51 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Internal API components and model for Fedora Notifications
